summary: The bizarre story behind Lee Harvey Oswald, the man accused of assassinating U.S. President John F. Kennedy in Dallas, Texas on November 22, 1963, and what might have happened had he been brought to trial.

keywords: trial|alternate history|kennedy assassination|two part tv movie|courtroom
title: El juicio de Lee Harvey Oswald
